conbody.p: Universal indicator pane is used for displaying universal status indicators, that is, status indicators that need to be visible regardless of the current application. There is room for at least three indicators, although depending on the resolution, it may be possible to display more than three. The items are prioritized according to their importance.

p.note: The universal indicator popup can be opened by tapping the universal indicator pane.

fig.title: Universal indicator pane. Indicators are placed side by side at the top (above the clock in the image on the right).

conbody.p: The universal indicator pane is not accessible to applications.
